name: Become A Lunora Member
description: Create an account and start your journey!
longDescription: Sign up, complete your profile (goals, location, obstacles) and explore the workout library.

name: Full Body Ignite
description: Kickstart your journey with balanced full-body sessions.
longDescription: Do 3–4 guided full-body strength workouts this week (home or gym). End with one active recovery flow to recharge.

name: Core Crusher
description: Tighten and strengthen your midsection.
longDescription: Complete 3 guided core circuits this week (abs, obliques, back) and finish with one active recovery yoga flow.

name: Lower Body Burn
description: Build strength in your legs and glutes.
longDescription: Do 2–3 lower-body strength workouts focused on squats, lunges, and glute bridges, plus 1 mobility recovery routine.

name: Upper Body Shred
description: Sculpt your arms, chest, and back.
longDescription: Do 2 push-focused upper body workouts (chest, triceps, shoulders) and 1 pull-focused workout (back, biceps). End with an active stretch session.

name: Strength Foundations
description: Master the basics of strength training.
longDescription: Do 3 guided strength workouts this week focusing on form, posture, and controlled movements. End with one recovery yoga session.

name: Hybrid Power Week
description: Mix upper, lower, and full body sessions.
longDescription: Do 1 upper-body workout, 1 lower-body workout, 1 full-body session, and 1 mobility recovery.

name: Glute Builder
description: Target your glutes for strength and shape.
longDescription: Do 3 glute-focused lower-body workouts this week (hip thrusts, bridges, kickbacks) plus 1 yoga recovery session.

name: Active Recovery Hero
description: Prioritize rest and smart recovery.
longDescription: Do 3 regular strength workouts this week, plus 2 full recovery flows (yoga or mobility).

name: Full Body Power
description: Unleash your total strength.
longDescription: Do 3 full-body compound strength sessions (squats, deadlifts, presses) and one recovery stretch routine.

name: Gym Strength Builder
description: Maximize gains with weighted sessions.
longDescription: At the gym, do 3 strength sessions: upper body push, lower body, and full body compound lifts. Include 1 active recovery.

name: Home Hero
description: Transform your body with bodyweight and bands.
longDescription: Do 4 home-based bodyweight or resistance-band workouts and finish with 1 yoga recovery flow.

name: Mobility Flow
description: Unlock your flexibility and joint strength.
longDescription: Complete 3 strength workouts and 2 guided mobility/recovery flows this week.

name: 6+ Beast Mode
description: Train like a machine — daily discipline.
longDescription: Do 6 workouts this week: 2 upper body, 2 lower body, 1 full body, and 1 active recovery.

name: Strength Split
description: Focus on different muscle groups every day.
longDescription: Do a 3-day split: Day 1 upper body, Day 2 lower body, Day 3 full body compound lifts. End with recovery yoga.

name: Strength Endurance
description: Build strength that lasts.
longDescription: Do 3–4 strength workouts using moderate weight and higher reps. End with 1 mobility recovery.

name: Sweat & Strength
description: Pair intensity with power.
longDescription: Do 2 full-body strength circuits and 2 split routines this week. Finish with 1 recovery yoga session.

name: Recovery Reset
description: Give your body the reset it deserves.
longDescription: Do 3 strength workouts and 2 mobility/recovery flows this week.

name: Athlete Mode
description: Push harder, recover smarter.
longDescription: Do 5 workouts this week: 2 upper body, 2 lower body, and 1 recovery flow.

name: Quick Strength
description: Fast but effective strength sessions.
longDescription: Complete 4 short 20–30 minute strength circuits this week, plus 1 recovery stretch.

name: Strong Back
description: Support your posture and power.
longDescription: Do 2 guided back and shoulder workouts, 1 core stability workout, and finish with mobility recovery.

name: Posterior Chain Power
description: Strengthen your back, glutes, and hamstrings.
longDescription: Do 3 workouts this week focusing on deadlifts, glute bridges, and rows. End with recovery yoga.

name: Mobility Mastery
description: Perfect your movement quality.
longDescription: Do 2 mobility routines and 2 strength sessions this week to improve range of motion and reduce stiffness.

name: Balance Builder
description: Work on stability and coordination.
longDescription: Do 2 balance-focused workouts (single-leg, core stability), 2 strength workouts, and finish with mobility recovery.

name: Strong & Confident
description: Empower your body and mind.
longDescription: Do 2 heavy lifting workouts, 2 accessory strength sessions, and 1 recovery yoga session.

name: Cycle Mastery
description: Master your weekly training rhythm.
longDescription: Do 5 workouts this week in a set rhythm: Day 1 upper body, Day 2 lower body, Day 3 recovery, Day 4 full body, Day 5 glutes.
